docs.title: A blog with update dates shown
docs.text:
This example shows how to add a small customization that will show then blog posts were [updated] on the blog index pages. (The blog page template already contains this.)

It shows how to:

  • add an update date in addition to the creation date for a post as in My first post
  • override the template index pages, so that the main blog index, the archive index and the categories index show the update date

Note: Please note that when overriding templates you are copying part of the code that makes up Material for MkDocs and so need to take care when upgrading. The changelog contains a note on which templates have changed, if any.

If you have not already set up a blog for your site then please start with the Basic blog example.
